text: Kíyè sí i, ẹ̀yin wọ̀nyí nífẹ̀ẹ́ wọn, àwọn kò sì nífẹ̀ẹ́ yín. Ẹ̀yin gbàgbọ́ nínú àwọn tírà, gbogbo rẹ̀ (pátápátá). Nígbà tí wọ́n bá sì pàdé yín, wọ́n á wí pé: “Àwa gbàgbọ́.” Nígbà tí ó bá sì ku àwọn nìkan, wọn yóò máa deyín mọ́ ìka lórí yín ní ti ìbínú. Sọ pé: “Ẹ kú pẹ̀lú ìbínú yín.” Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Onímọ̀ nípa ohun tí ń bẹ nínú àwọn igbá-àyà ẹ̀dá
